snippet: The Supreme Court will hear a case that could make it harder for investors to win class actions, and also will consider when the police could be sued for using excessive force.
abstract: Supreme Court agrees to hear a case that could make it harder for investors to win class-action lawsuits for securities fraud; court also agrees to consider when police officers could be sued for using excessive force to stop fleeing suspects.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court will hear a case that could make it harder for investors to win class actions, and also will consider when the police could be sued for using excessive force.

headline.main: Justices to Revisit Securities Fraud Suits
headline.print_headline: Justices to Revisit Securities Fraud Suits
